summary.span: 对模块执行反射。

span.span: Performs reflection on a module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模块是可移植可执行文件，例如 type.dll 或 application.exe，组成一个或多个类和接口。A module is a portable executable file, such as type.dll or application.exe, consisting of one or more classes and interfaces. 单个模块可包含多个命名空间，而一个命名空间可跨越多个模块。There may be multiple namespaces contained in a single module, and a namespace may span multiple modules. 作为一个单元部署的一个或多个模块组成一个程序集。One or more modules deployed as a unit compose an assembly. 使用多个模块创建程序集的信息，请参阅[多文件程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/multifile-assemblies.md)。For information about creating an assembly with more than one module, see [Multifile Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/multifile-assemblies.md). 请注意，.NET Framework 模块不在 Visual Basic，程序员用于组织函数和子例程中应用程序中的模块相同。Note that a .NET Framework module is not the same as a module in Visual Basic, which is used by a programmers to organize functions and subroutines in an application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用反射来获取有关模块的信息：The following code examples show how to use reflection to get information about modules: [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任代码继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是特殊类加载异常。 is a special class load exception. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types`属性包含在模块中定义的和已加载的类的数组。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types` property contains the array of classes that were defined in the module and were loaded. 此数组可能包含一些空值。This array may contain some null values. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions`属性是一个数组，表示由类加载程序引发的异常的异常。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions` property is an array of exceptions that represent the exceptions that were thrown by the class loader. 类数组中的孔对准有例外。The holes in the class array line up with the exceptions. 给定的委托`filter`调用中传递的模块的一个类`Type`对象，表示类以及给定`filterCriteria`。The delegate given by `filter` is called for each class in the module, passing along the `Type` object representing the class as well as the given `filterCriteria`. 如果`filter`返回特定类，该类将包含在返回的数组。If `filter` returns a particular class, that class will be included in the returned array. 如果`filter`将返回`null`，则返回所有类和`filterCriteria`将被忽略。If `filter` returns `null`, all classes are returned and `filterCriteria` is ignored. `FindTypes` 不能用于查找如数组的参数化类型。`FindTypes` cannot be used to look up parameterized types such as arrays. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`FindTypes`方法。The following example demonstrates the `FindTypes` method. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果该类型已转发到另一个程序集，它仍通过此方法返回。If the type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is still returned by this method. 类型转发的信息，请参阅[公共语言运行时中的类型转发](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). 一个类型可以检索从特定的模块使用。A type can be retrieved from a specific module using . 调用包含清单的模块上将不搜索整个程序集。Calling on the module that contains the manifest will not search the entire assembly. 若要从程序集，它是在中，而不考虑哪个模块检索类型必须调用。To retrieve a type from an assembly, regardless of which module it is in, you must call . ## Examples 下面的示例显示在指定的模块中的一种类型的名称。The following example displays the name of a type in the specified module. remarks.format: ## Remarks `throwOnError`参数影响仅找不到类型时的情况。The `throwOnError` parameter affects only what happens when the type is not found. 它不会影响任何其他可能会引发的异常。It does not affect any other exceptions that might be thrown. 具体而言，如果找到但不能加载，类型可能会引发即使`throwOnError`是`false`。In particular, if the type is found but cannot be loaded, can be thrown even if `throwOnError` is `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果该类型已转发到另一个程序集，它仍通过此方法返回。If the type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is still returned by this method. 类型转发的信息，请参阅[公共语言运行时中的类型转发](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). 一个类型可以检索从特定的模块使用。A type can be retrieved from a specific module using . 调用包含清单的模块上将不搜索整个程序集。Calling on the module that contains the manifest will not search the entire assembly. 若要从程序集，它是在中，而不考虑哪个模块检索类型必须调用。To retrieve a type from an assembly, regardless of which module it is in, you must call . ## Examples 下面的示例显示在指定的模块中的一种类型的名称。The following example displays the name of a type in the specified module. `throwOnError`并`ignoreCase`参数指定为`false`。The `throwOnError` and `ignoreCase` parameters are specified as `false`. remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReflectionTypeLoadException` 是特殊的加载异常。`ReflectionTypeLoadException` is a special load exception. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types`属性包含在模块中定义的并已加载的类型的数组。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types` property contains the array of types that were defined in the module and were loaded. 此数组可能包含一些空值。This array may contain some null values. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions`属性是一个数组，表示由加载程序引发的异常的异常。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions` property is an array of exceptions that represent the exceptions that were thrown by the loader. 类数组中的孔对准有例外。The holes in the class array line up with the exceptions. 例如，如果一个类的类初始值设定项引发时出现异常后被加载，`TargetInvocationException`存储中的相应元素`LoaderExceptions`数组。For example, if the class initializers of one of the classes throws an exception while it is being loaded, a `TargetInvocationException` is stored in the corresponding element of the `LoaderExceptions` array. > [!NOTE] > 如果一个类型已转发到另一个程序集，它不是包含在返回的数组。If a type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is not included in the returned array. 类型转发的信息，请参阅[公共语言运行时中的类型转发](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要解决的元数据令牌标识的字段的父级`TypeSpec`具有包含元素类型的签名`ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR`或`ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR`，使用方法重载，它允许您提供必要的上下文。To resolve a metadata token that identifies a field whose parent `TypeSpec` has a signature containing element type `ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR` or `ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR`, use the method overload, which allows you to supply the necessary context. 也就是说，来解析依赖于泛型类型和/或在其中嵌入令牌的泛型方法的泛型类型参数的字段的元数据令牌，必须使用允许您提供这些类型参数的重载。That is, when you are resolving a metadata token for a field that depends on the generic type parameters of the generic type and/or the generic method in which the token is embedded, you must use the overload that allows you to supply those type parameters. > [!NOTE] > 有关元数据令牌的信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 联机; 提供了的文档请参阅[ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)MSDN 上和[标准 ECMA-335-公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) ECMA 网站上。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the ECMA Web site. 有关演示令牌的解决方法的代码使用泛型上下文 （即，泛型类型和/或在其中嵌入令牌的泛型方法的泛型类型参数） 请参阅方法。For code that demonstrates token resolution using the generic context (that is, the generic type parameters of the generic type and/or the generic method in which the token is embedded) see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的类型上方法的`metadataToken`在范围内，若要获取的泛型类型参数的数组`genericTypeArguments`。Use the method on the type where `metadataToken` is in scope to obtain an array of generic type arguments for `genericTypeArguments`. 使用方法在方法上的`metadataToken`在范围内，若要获取的泛型类型参数的数组`genericTypeArguments`。Use the method on the method where `metadataToken` is in scope to obtain an array of generic type arguments for `genericTypeArguments`. 始终是安全即使在不需要提供这些参数。It is always safe to provide these arguments, even when they are not needed. > [!NOTE] > 有关元数据令牌的信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 联机; 提供了的文档请参阅[ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)MSDN 上和[标准 ECMA-335-公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) ECMA 网站上。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the ECMA Web site. 有关演示令牌的解决方法的代码使用泛型上下文 （即，泛型类型和/或在其中嵌入令牌的泛型方法的泛型类型参数） 请参阅方法。For code that demonstrates token resolution using the generic context (that is, the generic type parameters of the generic type and/or the generic method in which the token is embedded) see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要解决的元数据标记`MethodSpec`其签名包含元素类型`ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR`或`ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR`，使用方法重载，它允许您提供必要的上下文。To resolve a metadata token for a `MethodSpec` whose signature contains element type `ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR` or `ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR`, use the method overload, which allows you to supply the necessary context. 也就是说，来解析依赖于泛型类型的泛型类型参数的方法和/或在其中嵌入令牌的泛型方法的元数据标记，必须使用允许您提供这些类型参数的重载。That is, when you are resolving a metadata token for a method that depends on the generic type parameters of the generic type and/or the generic method in which the token is embedded, you must use the overload that allows you to supply those type parameters. > [!NOTE] > 有关元数据令牌的信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 联机; 提供了的文档请参阅[ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)MSDN 上和[标准 ECMA-335-公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) ECMA 网站上。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the ECMA Web site. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用的两个重载泛型和非泛型上下文中的方法来解析元数据标记从调用站点。The following example shows how to use the two overloads of the method to resolve metadata tokens from call sites in generic and non-generic contexts. 代码示例定义两个泛型类型`G1`并`G2`(`G1(Of Tg1)`和`G2(Of Tg2)`在 Visual Basic 中)，其中每个泛型方法。The code example defines two generic types, `G1` and `G2` (`G1(Of Tg1)` and `G2(Of Tg2)` in Visual Basic), each of which has a generic method. `G1` 此外具有使用类型参数的非泛型方法`Tg1`其参数。`G1` also has a non-generic method that uses the type parameter `Tg1` for its parameter. 泛型方法`GM2`类型中`G2`包含多个方法调用：The generic method `GM2` in type `G2` contains several method calls: - 案例 1： 泛型方法`GM1`使用的类型参数的调用`G2`和`GM2`作为类型参数。Case 1: The generic method `GM1` is called, using the type parameters of `G2` and `GM2` as the type arguments. 换而言之，所调用的方法的参数类型将取决于用于构造封闭式泛型类型中的类型定义的类型`G2`。In other words, the parameter types of the called method will depend on the types that are used to construct a closed generic type from the type definition for `G2`. - 案例 2： 非泛型方法`M1`调用。Case 2: The non-generic method `M1` is called. 此方法的参数使用定义类型的类型参数`G1`，封闭类型的类型参数将在这种情况下替换该`G2`。The parameter of this method uses the type parameter of the defining type, `G1`, which is replaced in this case by the type parameter of the enclosing type, `G2`. - 案例 3： 泛型方法`GM1`调用时，指定和对于泛型类型和泛型方法的类型参数分别。Case 3: The generic method `GM1` is called, specifying and for the type arguments of the generic type and the generic method, respectively. 此方法调用不依赖于封闭类型或方法的类型参数。This method call does not depend on the type parameters of the enclosing type or method. - 情形 4： 非泛型方法`M1`的`Example`调用类。Case 4: The non-generic method `M1` of the `Example` class is called. 此方法调用不依赖于封闭类型或方法的类型参数。This method call does not depend on the type parameters of the enclosing type or method. 此外，该示例定义非泛型`Example`类。In addition, the example defines the non-generic `Example` class. 此类有一个方法`M`，该方法调用到一个泛型方法：This class has a method `M` that makes a call to a generic method: - 情况 5： 泛型方法`GM1`调用时，指定和对于泛型类型和泛型方法的类型参数分别。Case 5: The generic method `GM1` is called, specifying and for the type arguments of the generic type and the generic method, respectively. 此方法上下文包含没有封闭泛型类型或泛型方法。The context for this method has no enclosing generic type or generic method. 对于每种情况下，该示例首先构造，表示调用的方法，并在随后解析令牌使用方法重载，使用并方法来获取其值`genericTypeArguments`和`genericMethodArguments`参数。For each case, the example first constructs a that represents the called method, and then resolves the token using the method overload, using the and methods to get the values for the `genericTypeArguments` and `genericMethodArguments` parameters. 此种方式适用于所有情况下，，因为这些方法返回为非泛型上下文。This technique works in all cases, because the methods return for non-generic contexts. 该示例比较了已解析与构造。The example compares the resolved with the constructed . 该示例会尝试使用方法重载来解析这个令牌。The example then attempts to use the method overload to resolve the token. 这可以用例 3、 4 和 5，因为方法调用不依赖于泛型上下文。This works in cases 3, 4, and 5, because the method calls do not depend on the generic context. 在 1 和 2 的情况下，由于信息不足，无法解析令牌引发异常。In cases 1 and 2, an exception is thrown because there is insufficient information to resolve the token. 元数据令牌值是硬编码为枚举。The metadata token values are hard-coded as an enumeration. 如果更改此代码示例，令牌的值都可能会更改。If you change this code example, the token values are likely to change. 若要确定新的令牌值，编译代码并使用与 Ildasm.exe **/header**选项以检查该程序集。To determine the new token values, compile the code and use Ildasm.exe with the **/TOKENS** option to examine the assembly. 可以在的调用点找到令牌。The tokens can be found at the points of call. 将新值插入到枚举，并重新编译该示例。Insert the new values into the enumeration, and recompile the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要解决的元数据标记`TypeSpec`其签名包含`ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR`或`ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR`，使用方法重载，它允许您提供必要的上下文。To resolve a metadata token for a `TypeSpec` whose signature contains `ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR` or `ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR`, use the method overload, which allows you to supply the necessary context. 也就是说，来解析依赖于泛型类型和/或在其中嵌入令牌的泛型方法的泛型类型参数的类型的元数据令牌，必须使用允许您提供这些类型参数的重载。That is, when you are resolving a metadata token for a type that depends on the generic type parameters of the generic type and/or the generic method in which the token is embedded, you must use the overload that allows you to supply those type parameters. > [!NOTE] > 有关元数据令牌的信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 联机; 提供了的文档请参阅[ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)MSDN 上和[标准 ECMA-335-公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) ECMA 网站上。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the ECMA Web site.
